scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run combined-build
scripts.combined-build: npm run build-status && npm run build-getSHEsecret && npm run build-postSHEsecret && npm run build-getE2Esecret && npm run build-postE2Esecret && npm run build-postPublicKey && npm run build-getPublicKey && npm run build-invalidatePublicKey && npm run build-login && npm run build-logout && npm run build-refresh && npm run build-step-getPublicKey
scripts.build-status: export NAME=status && esbuild $NAME.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/$NAME.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-$NAME.zip $NAME.js* && rm -rf *.js*
scripts.build-getSHEsecret: export NAME=getSHEsecrets && esbuild $NAME.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/$NAME.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-$NAME.zip $NAME.js* && rm -rf *.js*
scripts.build-postSHEsecret: export NAME=postSHEsecrets && esbuild $NAME.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/$NAME.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-$NAME.zip $NAME.js* && rm -rf *.js*

scripts.build-step-getPublicKey: export NAME=step-getPublicKey && esbuild $NAME.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/$NAME.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-$NAME.zip $NAME.js* && rm -rf *.js*
scripts.build-invalidatePublicKey: export NAME=invalidatePublicKey && esbuild $NAME.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/$NAME.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-$NAME.zip $NAME.js* && rm -rf *.js*
